description.value: As an action, you can violently expel air in a 15-foot cone. When you do so, each creature in the area of the exhalation must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier). A creature takes [[/r 2d6]] sonic damage on a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful one. The damage increases to [[/r 4d6]] at 5th level, [[/r 6d6]] at 11th level, and [[/r 8d6]] at 17th level. This ability has no effect on constructs. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses when you complete a long rest.
